title: Contemporary Diamond Mangalsutra - నల్లపూసల దండ (Nallapusala Danda)
features: Delicate rose gold chain interspersed with traditional black beads (nallapusalu) for warding off evil. Five centrally-placed diamond floral motifs add a touch of modern elegance. The sleek design provides a lightweight and comfortable fit. Finished with Hyderabadi craftsmanship for a flawless look.
description: A modern take on the traditional Mangalsutra, blending cultural significance with contemporary design. The use of brilliant cut diamonds and rose gold elevates the piece, making it a stylish and meaningful accessory. Durable and lightweight, perfect for daily wear. Symbolizes marital bliss and protection.
